// Generated by curl-to-PHP: http://incarnate.github.io/curl-to-php/
$ch = curl_init();

curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://api.godaddy.com/v1/domains/available?domain=ishyiak.me&checkType=FULL&forTransfer=false');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'GET');


$headers = array();
$headers[] = "Content-Type: application/json";
$headers[] = 'Accept: application/json';
$headers[] = 'Authorization: sso-key e5CU7wue8cNX_KXGwXLnLW1oDmK82nwvFs7:U1LoFScxpbayKhuxjkBo1A';
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);

$result = curl_exec($ch);
if (curl_errno($ch)) {
    echo 'Error:' . curl_error($ch);
}
curl_close($ch);


print_r($result);



$ch = curl_init();

curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://api.godaddy.com/v1/domains/suggest?query=ishtiak&sources=&tlds=com,org,net,io,app,info,me,&waitMs=2000');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'GET');


$headers = array();
$headers[] = "Content-Type: application/json";
$headers[] = 'Accept: application/json';
$headers[] = 'Authorization: sso-key e5CU7wue8cNX_KXGwXLnLW1oDmK82nwvFs7:U1LoFScxpbayKhuxjkBo1A';
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);

$result = curl_exec($ch);
if (curl_errno($ch)) {
    echo 'Error:' . curl_error($ch);
}
curl_close($ch);


print_r($result);
